From stuff

Missouri is a beautiful place.

Wisconsin and Minnesota aren't so bad either.
I just got back to Los Angeles, so it might take me a while to put up some more shots but they'll be up by the end of the week. We also got some video from a few of the shows. The tour was a total success. Special thanks to:

Nate for hooking it up in Madison
Nick for setting up the New Earth show
Christopher at the Weary Traveller

We sold cds, we spread the word, and we realized that I should probably do my version of Hallelujah at every show. Good to know. :)
